option.name: --huge
option.description: Remove any internal arbitrary parser limits

option.name: --net
option.description: Allow network access to load external DTD and entities

option.name: --xml-catalog
option.description: Use an XML catalog when resolving entities

option.name: -I
option.description: Issue date in the form of YYYY-MM-DD

option.name: -i
option.description: Include issue information in referenced data modules

option.name: -l
option.description: Include language information in referenced data modules

option.name: -m
option.description: Remarks for the new publication module

option.name: -p
option.description: Prompt the user for any values left unspecified

option.name: -q
option.description: Do not report an error when the file already exists

option.name: -R
option.description: CAGE code of the responsible partner company

option.name: -T
option.description: Include titles in referenced data modules

option.name: -v
option.description: Print the file name of the newly created publication module

description.defaultsFile: The .defaults file is used by all the s1kd-new* commands. Refer to s1kd-newdm for more information on the .defaults file.
description.exampleUsage: An example of using the s1kd-newpm command is: $ s1kd-newpm -# EX-12345-00001-00
